resources.string: This food truck management app offers you the ability to manage your very own food truck! In the main menu, you have the ability to chose from 1 of 3 features of this app, plus 1 additional bonus feature for an enhanced managerial experience.

The first feature is the staff Management. In this menu, you are able to add a staff name, along with a integer ID for identification. These can be then modified by clicking the item in the list of staff members. After clicking a staff member name, a sub menu will appear where you are able to modify their name (only take a string) and ID (integer). You are also able to give this staff member a schedule by clicking the "change schedule" button and then by selecting a date of the week and a starting time. You are also able to remove a staff member by clicking the red remove button.

The second feature is the inventory Management. In this menu, you are able to add an item name, along with the number of items to add. The items that can be added goes into 2 categories: ingredients and others. To chose into which list an item goes, simply check/uncheck the check box before adding. After clicking an item name, a sub menu will appear where you are able to modify their name (only take a string) and number (integer). You are also able to remove an item by clicking the red remove button.

The third feature is the menu item Management.In this menu, you are able to add an food item name, along with the price of items to add, and a popularity number (number of items sold). After clicking an item name, a sub menu will appear where you are able to modify their name (only take a string), price (takes a double or an integer) and popularity number (integer). You are also able to remove an item by clicking the red remove button.

The last bonus feature is the add order feature. In this menu, you can to the number of an food menu item directly. This feature is to help you keep track of the food menu item popularity easier. For example, at the end of the day if you would like to add the food items sold today from the receipts collected, simply go in here and add them directly. You just have to enter the name of the item you want to add to (can only add to items already in the food menu list) and a number to add to the popularity number (integer). this new number will be then added to the previous popularity number directly. Because this is an add order feature, to access this feature, you must first have items in the menu.
